Tracer.DY/NY: Diamidino yellow combined with nuclear yellow
Tracer.Thymidine: Thymidine analog / Deoxythymidine / Deoxyribosylthymine / Thymine deoxyriboside
Tracer.WGA-HRP: Wheat germ agglutinin conjugated to horseradish peroxidase

Parcellation_Scheme.Paxinos_1999: Paxinos, G., Huang, X. & Toga, A. W. (1999). The Rhesus Monkey Brain in Stereotaxic Coordinates. San Diego, USA: Academic Press.
Parcellation_Scheme.Brodmann_1903: K. Brodmann: Beiträge zur histologischen Lokalisation der Großhirnrinde. II. Mitteilung: Der Calcarinatypus. Journ. f. Psychol. u. Neurol. 2 (4). 1903 (38)
Parcellation_Scheme.Olszewski_1952: Olzewski, J.. The Thalamus of the Macaca mulatta, an Atlas for Use with the Stereotaxic Instrument, S. Karger, Basel-New York, 1952.
Parcellation_Scheme.Jones_1985: Jones, E.G. (1985) The Thalamus. Plenum Press, New York.
Parcellation_Scheme.Jones_1990: Jones, E.G. (1990) Correlation and revised nomenclature of ventral nuclei in the thalamus of human and monkey. Stereotact. Funct. Neurosurg., 54–55, 1–20.
Parcellation_Scheme.Jones_1989: Jones, E.G. & Hendry, S.H.C. (1989) Differential calcium binding protein immunoreactivity distinguishes classes of relay neurons in monkey thalamic nuclei. Eur. J. Neurosci., 1, 222–246.
Parcellation_Scheme.Morel_1997: Morel, A., Magnin, M. & Jeanmonod, D. (1997) Multiarchitectonic and stereotactic atlas of the human thalamus. J. Comp. Neurol., 387, 588–630. [Erratum: J. Comp. Neurol., 391, 545 (1998)].
Parcellation_Scheme.Kusama_1970: Kusama T, Mabuchi M (1970) Stereotaxic atlas of the brain of macaca fuscata. University of Tokyo Press, Tokyo
Parcellation_Scheme.Walker_1940: Walker, A.E. (1940) A cytoarchitectural study of the prefrontal area of the macaque monkey. J. Comp. Neurol. 73t59-86.
Parcellation_Scheme.Asanuma_1983: Asanuma C, Thach WT, Jones EG (1983) Distribution of cerebellar terminations and their relation to other afferent terminations in the ventral lateral thalamic region of the monkey. Brain Res Rev 286:237–265
Parcellation_Scheme.Schell_1984: Schell, G.R., and P.L. Strick 11984) Origin of thalamic input to the arcuate premotor and supplementary motor areas. J. Neurosci 4:539-560.

Thalamic_Areas.vMGB: ventral divisions of the medial geniculate body
Thalamic_Areas.dMGB: dorsal divisions of the medial geniculate body
Thalamic_Areas.mMGB: medial divisions of the medial geniculate body
